price: (70) So the magicians fell down in prostration.[841] They said, "We have believed in the Lord of Aaron and Moses."
arabic: فَأُلۡقِيَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ سُجَّدٗا قَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّ هَٰرُونَ وَمُوسَىٰ
footnotes: [841]- After they had seen the miracles which Allāh had given Moses and that they were realities and not merely impressions of magic.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fa-ul'qiya al-saḥaratu sujjadan qālū āmannā birabbi hārūna wamūsā
